official_title: To provide relief from regulatory requirements inhibiting the effectiveness and productivity of public housing agencies.

summary.text: Public Housing Regulatory Relief Act - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to authorize the waiver (with specified exceptions) of public housing requirements. Permits a public housing agency (PHA) to retain savings realized through efficient management. Authorizes the recapture of public housing modernization funds. Authorizes PHAs to borrow against future modernization funds. Directs the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to study PHA labor and acquisition requirements.

titles.title: To provide relief from regulatory requirements inhibiting the effectiveness and productivity of public housing agencies.
